dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 102 IS: To recognize and celebrate the 30th anniversary of the Denver International Airport
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Bennet (for himself and Mr. Hickenlooper) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To recognize and celebrate the 30th anniversary of the Denver International Airport

section.text: That the Senate recognizes and celebrates February 28th, 2025, as the 30th anniversary of the Denver International Airport.
